intro: The v-snackbar component is used to display a quick message to a user. Snackbars support positioning, removal delay, and callbacks.

multiline.heading: Multi line
multiline.intro: The multi-line property extends the height of the v-snackbar to give you a little more room for content.

timeout.heading: Timeout
timeout.intro: The timeout property lets you customize the delay before the v-snackbar is hidden.

variants.heading: Variants
variants.intro: Apply different styles to the snackbar using props such as text, shaped, outlined, and more.
